title.narrative: Nigeria Joint Response 2020

description.narrative: Second year that Tdh responds to the Nigerian crisis within the Nigeria Joint Response, funded by the Dutch MFA, and led by Save the Children. Location: Borno State (Mafa, Dikwa and Gwoza LGA) Activities include WASH, natal education, cholera/ malaria/ measles awareness, community based management of childhood illnesses - through mobile teams, PSS, CPiE awareness and CM. Project includes a COVID-19 Top Up and Innovation scale-up funding.
1st instalment
2nd instalment
1st instalment
2nd instalment
COVID-19 top up

Expenditure 2020
